extendedInfo.description: ** Phone Application **** Includes updated congressional members info for the 113th Congress **This is your one-stop Congressional directory that provides all the information you will ever need to know about members of the US Senate and House of Representatives.At your fingertips, you have access to the information every citizen of the United States wants to know about their Congressional representatives. Not only can you instantly acquire contact information for both their Washington, DC and district offices, but in seconds you will learn each Committee our Senate and House representatives participate on! The search feature is comprehensive and easy to use.Application data includes:    Congress Member Name    Congress Member State - District - Party - Title    Congress Member DC Address (Street, City, State and Zip code)    Congress Member DC Phone Number    Congress Member District Phone Number    Congress Member DC Website    Congress Member House Committees    Congress Member Senate CommitteesSearching Features:    Search by House    Search by Senate    Search by House Committee    Search by Senate Committee    Search by StateThe goal of US Congress Committees is to provide all citizens with important information about their representatives of the United States government. We continue to update our database to ensure up-to-date and accurate congressional information.

reviews.title: Recommend App!
reviews.comment: This is a great app that list contact info on all house and senate members! It also gives you committee names with all members. Amazing App!
reviews.author: A Google User
